spatial_accuracy.notes: Major layout discrepancies. The stairwell/crawlspace access area from the plan is missing, replaced by a generic hallway/room. The bay window (window seat) on the right side of the dining room in the plan is rendered as a flat wall with standard windows. Door placements and room types (e.g., WC, Utility) are significantly altered or simplified.

structural_fidelity.notes: The model successfully removes the roof and uses a dark neutral background without UI text. However, it fails on structural reinterpretation by omitting the complex stairs and specific utility room geometry seen in the 2D blueprint.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture is clean and block-style. Dining table and kitchen fixtures correspond roughly to the intended zones, but sink and stove orientation in the kitchen contradicts the L-shape/Pantry layout indicated on the plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent adherence to style constraints. Low-poly geometry, flat shading, isometric orthographic camera, and professional neutral presentation. Small deduction for a slight perspective distortion in the far-left corner.

detected_errors.description: Missing specific architectural features: Stairwell, Window Seat (bay window), and specific pantry/utility partitions.
Layout distortion in the central hall area; the 3D model simplifies a complex geometric core into simple rectangular rooms.
Hallucination of windows on the front and left walls that do not match the specific openings or alcoves in the blueprint.
